V.iii.6.2.f
.
Other Causes of Liver Damage
The table below describes recognized causes of liver damage and provides examples of each cause.
Cause of Liver Damage
Example
Infection
Virus
Systemic diseases
Lupus
Drugs
Isoniazid
Acetaminophen
Phenytoin
Toxic substances
Alcohol
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 6 - Digestive Disabilities
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 6, Section None
